General.Name: Guangdong SACA Precision Manufacturing Co Ltd
General.Description: Guangdong SACA Precision Manufacturing Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the research, development, design, and sale of consumer electronic products in China and internationally. The company offers power supplies products, including mobile power supplies, chargers, data cables, hubs, car accessories; bluetooth products, which include bluetooth wireless headsets, bluetooth speakers, and bluetooth devices; household appliances; computer and mobile phone peripherals; personal health care; and other products. It also provides precision metal connectors, including riding drawers, hide rails, ball slides, powder spray rails, upturn support doors, hinges, kitchen function pulls, sinks/faucets, and other kitchen accessories. The company serves furniture, household and home appliances, IT, finance, automobiles, and other industries. It sells its consumer electronics products through online. The company also exports its products to Europe, North America, Europe, Japan, and the Middle East. Guangdong SACA Precision Manufacturing Co., Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Foshan, China.
